    • Georgia Enrollment Data

Get available years for Georgia enrollment data

Source: R/get_raw_enrollment.R
get_available_years.Rd

Returns the range of years available from GOSA (Governor's Office of Student Achievement). GOSA provides enrollment data from the 2010-11 school year (end_year = 2011) through 2023-24 (end_year = 2024).

Usage

get_available_years()

Value

A list with components:

min_year

Integer. The earliest available year (2011).

max_year

Integer. The most recent available year (2024).

description

Character. A description of the data availability.

Examples

get_available_years()
#> $min_year
#> [1] 2011
#> 
#> $max_year
#> [1] 2024
#> 
#> $description
#> [1] "GOSA enrollment data (2010-11 through 2023-24 school years)"
#> 
# Returns list(min_year = 2011, max_year = 2024, description = "...")
